thread.title: Ethiopia: U.S.$175 Million Profit for Ethiopian Airlines
thread.title_full: Ethiopia: U.S.$175 Million Profit for Ethiopian Airlines

title: Ethiopia: U.S.$175 Million Profit for Ethiopian Airlines
text:
Ethiopia: Ethiopia Races to Preserve 'Africa's Jerusalem' 
Ethiopian Airlines is already planning to double its aircraft fleet and add new routes by 2025 s part of its long term plans. It currently operates a fleet of 77 aircraft. This includes 13 newly delivered Boeing 787-8 Dreamliners. 
Ethiopian Airlines plans to expand to new destinations, including Jakarta, Indonesia and Ho Chi Minh City, as well as to more points in India and of course more points in China, the statement said. 
The company has 50 aircraft on order, which includes 14 Airbus A350 and six 787. By 2025, the company intends to increase its revenues to $10 billion and operate 30 Boeing 787 aircraft. Ethiopia
